_source: s;NikaPossessed;That's what I've been told.{w}{br}I'm Nika, from Frees Village.
s;LimPossessed;I'm Lim, from Ramm Village.{w} I heard that Frees is very beautiful.
s;NikaPossessed;It's safe. More than most of the border villages.
s;NikaPossessed;Lim, I need to be honest.{w}{br}I shouldn't be leading.
s;NikaPossessed;And I was drafted a day before I got that promotion.
s;NikaPossessed;This "army" is a sick joke.{w} If we fight a real battle,{w}{br}we won't stand a chance.
s;NikaPossessed;We need to watch out for each other.{w}{br}That's all.
